hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'rm -rf /|rm -rf \*|DROP TABLE|TRUNCATE TABLE|--force push|push.*--force'; then echo 'Blocked: Dangerous command. Run manually if intended.' && exit 2; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'git push.*(origin|upstream)?.*(main|master)($|[^-])'; then echo 'Blocked: Direct push to main/master. Run manually if intended.' && exit 2; fi
for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do if [[ "$f" == *.py ]]; then uv run ruff check --fix "$f" 2>/dev/null && uv run ruff format "$f" 2>/dev/null; fi; done
